title: UserICE
description: This document records the details of the Incase of Emergency contact for the respective userID

SDChildSeat.description: Weight sensor momentary switch in belt-buckle. if weight detected and belt buckled then true, If no child detected then N/A or True, If weight detected and belt not buckled then false

Huskylens1.description: Sends image / video data if fatigue is detected

Huskylens2.description: Sends image / video data if wreckless driving is detected
